content: add a touch of luxury and handmade charm to your home with this beautiful tunisian crochet washcloth made from a cotton/linen blend this washcloth is soft absorbent and long-lasting this simple timeless design makes it perfect for any room and its stylish hand-crocheted texture will add a hint of elegance to your cleaning routine details - pattern is written in standard us terms - basic knowledge of beginner stitches is needed to make this pattern - step-by-step video tutorial + photos - size of washcloth 7 x 7 inches materials needed - 1 skein of hobby lobby yarn bee cotton et lin in the color parchment weight 4/ 3 5oz 180 yds a total of 180 yards or you can use another worsted weight yarn - 1 skein of hobby lobby yarn bee cotton et lin in the color rouge weight 4/ 3 5oz 180 yds a total of 180 yards or you can use another worsted weight yarn - 6 5 mm k tunisian crochet hook - darning needle - scissors other yarns you could use - hobby lobby i love this cotton yarn wecrochet dishie yarn lion brand cotton yarn drops paris
